anyOf.description:
@telus-uds/palette-koodo/v0.5.0 palette tokens üñåÔ∏è
For 'pill' designs with circular sides, which become rounded rectangles of radius 32 if forced to have height greater than 64 (for example, if user's accessibility settings increase text size)
anyOf.markdownDescription:
`@telus-uds/palette-koodo/v0.5.0` **palette** tokens üñåÔ∏è

For 'pill' designs with circular sides, which become rounded rectangles of radius 32 if forced to have height greater than 64 (for example, if user's accessibility settings increase text size)

anyOf.description:
@telus-uds/system-tokens/v0.6.4 system react-native tokens ‚öôÔ∏è
Any integer value. The spacing scale uses 0-11
anyOf.markdownDescription:
@telus-uds/system-tokens/v0.6.4 system react-native tokens ‚öôÔ∏è

Any integer value. The spacing scale uses `0-11`

üí° Only `0-11` are suggested, but **any positive integer** is valid.
See [themes](https://telus.github.io/universal-design-system/docs/themes) docs.
